oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Proceedings of the Twenty-Seventh Annual Conference (1994). Opening Ceremony, Saturday Night Extravaganza, and Tours
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Bovine Practitioners, American Association of
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The 27th Annual AABP Convention opened with the usual AABP hospitality at the Exhibits Hall, Lawrence Convention Center where old friendships were renewed and newcomers greeted with sumptuous hors d'oeuvres and beverages. One of Pittsburgh's favorite getaways is with the Gateway Clipper Fleet. On Saturday evening, a large number of AABP members and their spouses celebrated a special evening with a "Night Out On the Water" aboard the Captain's Dinner Dance Cruise. The local arrangements committee arranged several tours that attracted a wide variety of interests.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1994; vi-ix
